title: Option to disable the automatic backup of the XML parameters
author: ics01
body_snippet:
Using a sync service (Hubic, for instance) to register the parameters of mRemote (configMRemote.xml) should be improved by the disabling ability of the automatic backup of parameters.

## Expected Behavior
No creation of automatic backup

## Current Behavior
mRemote NG is creating an automatic backup (configMRemote.xml.20200324-1424534988, for example) at the opening and while closing the program. Depending on the option "Register connexions on exit", it may create other automatic backups....

iterations.description: Legitimate user request to add a toggle option that disables automatic XML backup creation during connection file saves.

notes:
AI triage (claude): Legitimate user request to add a toggle option that disables automatic XML backup creation during connection file saves.
Approach: Add a boolean setting (e.g. BackupOnSave) to app settings, expose it in the Options dialog under the Backup/Connections section, and wrap the existing backup call in Runtime.cs or the XML data provider with a guard that checks this setting before creating the .bak file.
